title: SPY's Happy Hour - July 3rd, 2014 - with mmx and Luke Williams
description: Musicians Luke Williams and Josh Smith visit the SPY Headquarters and play to the tune of happiness after SPY President/CEO Michael Marckx speaks about the brain's reaction to music. As he elaborates on this subtle connection to the roots of humanity, we learn that some of life's most simple pleasures (such as music, sex and chocolate) can have a complex and uplifting effect on one's state of mind.
